title: Can't pick chroma packs in new champ select!
body: Am I just missing them somewhere or are we unable to pick chroma packs in the new champ select? I can't find it anywhere.

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Thanks for the report! ^-^

This is one of [several known issues](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/HpUTbovb-known-issues-with-new-champ-select) that we're looking to resolve in the next couple of patches. Riot Lyte noted this specific one should be resolved in 6.2.
I can't use chroma either. My wallet is sad now :(

theese small squares are chroma pack-picking buttons

http://apollo-na-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/1430598253504/BlindPick.png
Yeah they aren't there in the new champ select.
